front.title: IS-IS Extension to Advertise SRv6 SIDs using SID Block

abstract.t: This document proposes a simplified method to advertise SRv6 SIDs in IS-IS. The SRv6 SID Block is composed of a number of continuous SIDs within the address range of a Locator. When a SID is assigned from the SID Block, it is described by an index based on the SID Block, instead of the whole 128-bit IPv6 address.
